author: Albert Stevens Crockett
description: Lemon juice balances this bourbon and crème de cacco-based red-coloured cocktail that is perhaps best served as an after-dinner cocktail.
name: Commodore No.2
recipeIngredient: 25 ml White crème de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice
